about_the_game:
《Spin & Jump》 is a casual and strategic Rougelite game that combines slot machines with combat.

A game with a slot machine as its core, all actions are determined by the slot machine!
The character's next actions, the damage caused to monsters, and the loot obtained!

Story background


The story will start from the protagonist's village, rescue the villagers and sister who were captured and missing by the Demon King's army, and meet various characters along the way!
Expand your base, add new optional characters, and experience a variety of different genres!

Events during the adventure


During the adventurous journey, you may also be chased by the BOSS.
But don’t panic yet! Say... maybe you can pick up martial arts secrets while running away (?

Game features

Battles, shops, collection, and even enhancements are all determined by the results of gambling!

As long as you react quickly enough, you can turn the impossible into possible!
